misc: Regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour as well with decent results
biography: Sami, a familiar face from Hirsala Golf, is set to make his seventh appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025. While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Sami's consistent presence underscores his dedication to the sport and the tournament.

Known for his meticulous approach and unwavering focus, Sami brings a quiet intensity to the course. While some may underestimate him due to his calm demeanor, those who have played alongside Sami know that he is a fierce competitor who never gives up.

Beyond the Hector Trophée, Sami regularly tests his mettle on the Finnish Mid Tour, achieving commendable results. This continued engagement in competitive golf ensures that Sami remains sharp and ready to tackle the challenges of the Hector Trophée.
